meanings.definition: Vinals (noun): A type of flooring material made from synthetic materials.
meanings.sent1: The vinals in the kitchen were easy to clean.
meanings.sent2: I chose vinals for the living room because they are durable.
meanings.sent3: Walking on the vinals felt like stepping on clouds.
meanings.sent4: The vinals in the hallway whispered under my feet.
meanings.sent5: The bright red vinals added a pop of color to the room.

meanings.definition: Vinals (verb): To cover or coat with vinyl material.
meanings.sent1: I need to vinals the kitchen floor before the party.
